Question: Uzabase USA, inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Uzabase USA, Inc.

SPEEDA Edge

- Innovation intelligence platform
- Offers insights across up to 200 emerging industries and up to 1,000 industry segments
- Automated mapping algorithm connects industry to over 200,000 startups
- Craft personalized weekly newsletters and quarterly reports using AI/ML and analyst insights
- Partnered with world-class companies like Microsoft, Swiss Re, HITACHI, CSL Behring, NTT DATA, and NEC
- Recognized as a CES® 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree in the Artificial Intelligence (AI) category
- Will be exhibited at CES® 2024 in January 2024
- CEO, Sho Tsuchiya, emphasizes creating 'wow products' based on user feedback and cutting-edge technologies like AI
Summary_cn:
Uzabase USA, Inc.

SPEEDA Edge

- 创新智能平台
- 提供多达200个新兴行业和1,000个行业细分的见解
- 自动化的映射算法将行业与超过200,000家创业公司连接起来
- 利用人工智能/机器学习和分析师见解，定制每周简报和季度报告
- 与微软、瑞士再保险、HITACHI、CSL贝林、NTT DATA和NEC等世界一流公司合作
- 被认定为2024年国际消费电子展（CES®）人工智能（AI）类别的创新奖荣誉获得者
- 将于2024年1月参展CES®2024
- CEO土谷翔强调基于用户反馈和人工智能等尖端技术创造'Wow产品'
